name: Music_2618.wav
keywords: ['traditional music', 'folk song', 'reed instrument', 'percussion melody', 'cymbals', 'moderate tempo', 'instrumental', 'no voices', 'no stringed instrument']
caption: This folk song features a reed instrument playing the main melody. A similar melody is played on a percussion instrument by a skilled percussionist. Another percussion instrument plays a tabla-sounding instrument. Cymbals also play a melody keeping time with the melody being played. The end of the song features an ascending run on the reed and the harmonized percussion.
